articles.title: Michigan basketball coach Juwan Howard suspended for the rest of the regular season - CNN
articles.description: Michigan head basketball coach Juwan Howard will not be on the sideline the rest of the regular season following a physical confrontation with members of the Wisconsin coaching staff that occurred after the Wolverines' loss to the Badgers on Sunday.
